slide.title: SOAP Envelope
slide.blurb: Only the Insane should deal with this
slide.example:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<SOAP-ENV:Envelope xmlns:SOAP-ENV= "http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:xsd= "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi= "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:SOAP-ENC= "http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/" xmlns:ns4="http://soapinterop.org/" SOAP-ENV:encodingStyle= "http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/">
<SOAP-ENV:Body>
<ns4:echoString> <inputString xsi:type="xsd:string">hello world!</inputString> </ns4:echoString>
</SOAP-ENV:Body>
</SOAP-ENV:Envelope>
